title: 2.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a class  Student that has two attributes: name and grade. Write a method pass_fail that prints Pass if the grade is above 50, and Fail if the grade is below or equal to 50, along with the name of the student.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
